trans-unit.source: Safeguard your personal data and identity
trans-unit.target: Šćitajśo swóje wósobinske daty a swóju identitu

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Surf the web and use your favorite apps freely without being tracked
trans-unit.target: Pśeglědujśo web a wužywajśo swóje nejlubše nałoženja licho, bźez togo, aby wam něchten slědował

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Keep confidential materials safe via our premium data encryption
trans-unit.target: Šćitajśo dowěrliwe materialije z našym premijowym datowym skoděrowanim

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Blocks unknown entities from seeing your private data on risky public Wi-Fi and hotspots
trans-unit.target: Zajźujo tomu, až njeznate wósoby waše priwatne daty na riskantnych zjawnych WLAN a hotspotach wiźe

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Protection wherever you are, from restaurants to vacation rentals
trans-unit.target: Šćit źožkuli sćo, wót gósćeńcow do prozninskich bydlenjow
Zwěžćo se z wěcej ako 30 krajami

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Browse and access content from all over the world
trans-unit.target: Pśeglědaśo a mějśo pśistup k wopśimjeśeju cełego swěta

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Shop on a regional server to get localized deals like cheaper airfare
trans-unit.target: Nakupujśo na regionalnem serwerje, aby lokalne póbitowanja dostał, na pś. niše płaśizny lěta

trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN secures the connection between your device and the web. Here’s some of the most useful features your VPN offers:
The top uses and benefits of using Mozilla VPN
trans-unit.target: Nejwažnjejše wužyśa a lěpšyny pśi wužywanju Mozilla VPN
